oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rock House Holiness Church service, 1999 June 19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a service that opens with singing by Bill Pelfrey, Gene Sherbert, and James Wade followed by Billy Summerford's preaching and singing by Joyce Summerford and James Wade. Jamie Coots testifies, sings, defends signs, and preaches baptism in the name of Jesus Christ. Bill Pelfrey also preaches and Gene Sherbert testifies.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region, Southern -- Religious life and customs; Lay preaching; Pentecostal preaching; Singing -- Religious aspects; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region, Southern
Barnes, Jason; Coots, Jamie, (Gregory James), 1971-2014; Covington, Dennis; Dukes, Glenn; Dunn, Rayford; Porter, Virgil; Summerford, Billy
Rock House Holiness Church (Sand Mountain, Ala.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Rock House Holiness Church field recordings, 1996-2004
Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson field recordings, interviews, and photographs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson Holiness Churches of Appalachia recordings and interviews
